verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am the Music Man newline I come from down your way newline And I can play newline Others:What can you play? newline I play the piano

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Pi-a, pi-a, pi-an-o newline Pi-an-o, Pi-an-o newline Pi-a, pi-a, pi-an-o newline Pi-a, Pi-an-o

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: What can you play newline I play trumbone

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Um-pa um-pa um-pa-pa newline Um-pa-pa um-pa-pa newline Um-pa um-pa um-pa-pa newline Um-pa um-pa-pa

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: What can you play newline I play the big base drum

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Boom-boom boom-boom boom-boom tsh boom-boom tsh boom-boom tsh boom-boom boom-boom tsh boom-boom boom-boom tsh
